name: DRIFT 84
description: DRIFT 84 puts you at the wheel of over 6 realistic, ESC disabled drift racing cars as you make your way around over 50+ tracks across Europe. A hyper-addictive, easy to play racing game that can offer 30 seconds or 30 minutes of high octane drifting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB graphics memory and directx 9.0c compatible gpu DirectX: Version 9.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB graphics memory and directx 9.0c compatible gpu
